Description: Horizon Lines LLC agreed to plead guilty and to pay a $45 million criminal fine for its role in a conspiracy to fix prices in the coastal water freight transportation industry.
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/horizon-lines-llc-agrees-plead-guilty-price-fixing-coastal-water-freight-services-between

Description: Sea Star Line LLC and Horizon Lines LLC agreed to resolve allegations that they violated the False Claims Act by fixing the price of government cargo transportation contracts between the continental United States and Puerto Rico.
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/two-ocean-shipping-companies-pay-34-million-settle-claims-price-fixing-government-cargo
https://www.fra.dot.gov/eLib/details/L04899#p1_z5_gD_lEA

Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
Info Source: Extracted from an NLRB dataset covering 1999-2011 downloaded at https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/nlrb-cats-final-c-case-data-bulk-19990101-20110930-in-xml

Description: Horizon Lines, LLC was sentenced Tuesday in front of the Honorable Richard Seeborg after pleading guilty to felony charges concerning violations of international and national oil pollution laws that occurred on a large container ship called the S/S Horizon Enterprise, United States Attorney Melinda Haag announced. As part of a plea agreement, the company was ordered to pay $1,500,000, with $500,000 of the monies going to environmental projects in the San Francisco Bay area.
Info Source: http://cfpub.epa.gov/compliance/criminal_prosecution/index.cfm?action=3&prosecution_summary_id=2295&searchParams=M5%2C%3A%2FXT%2A%5CCYZ%40O%3B%20W_%2AYN5%5E%3EK99%2A%29W%3CU%3FV%23DH%5BZ8%257TRPH%3BJQH%229%3FD%3C%26Z%40CY%26%0AM7EFH%21%25%21%3A%23%3DV%40%3A%2A_%3AB8%2A%5DR%3BB%25%5E9%5B2D%22I2K%2565NEY7M%21-U%40%2B8%22J%29Y%23%24LNJ%40DX%24%0A%2F5YJ%3EP%27O_K04_G%5C%3E%290M8%2F%0A
